Privacy Policy

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
Privacy Policy

Effective Date: October 13, 2025

This website (sourabhrajdev.space) respects your privacy and is committed to protecting it. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data.

1. Information We Collect

  • We do not collect any personal data unless you contact us directly via email.
  • We may use basic analytics tools (like Google Analytics) to understand general website usage. This data is anonymized and never linked to individuals.

2. Use of Information

Collected information is only used to improve the website's performance, design, and content relevance.

3. Cookies

This site may use cookies for performance tracking and functionality improvements. By using the site, you consent to the use of cookies.

4. Third-Party Services

  • We may use Google AdSense or other ad networks. These services may use cookies or web beacons to serve personalized ads.
  • You can opt out of personalized ads by visiting https://www.aboutads.info/choices/.

5. Your Rights

You can contact us to inquire about any data collected or request deletion of data that may have been shared with us.

6. Changes to This Policy

This policy may be updated from time to time. Changes will be posted here with an updated effective date.

7. Contact

If you have any questions, feel free to contact me at sourabhrajdev@gmail.com.

Last updated: October 13, 2025
